sentences.sContent: The pawnshop had sold the plates of his Flora after the expiration of thirteen months. Some coppersmith had made stewpans of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pawnshop had sold the plates of his Flora after the expiration of thirteen months. Some coppersmith had made stewpans of them.
sentences.sCn: 那当铺，过了十三个月，便把他那套《植物图说》的铜版全卖了，几个铜匠拿去做了些平底锅。

sentences.sContent: While he still went out, he had purchased of a coppersmith, for a few sous, a little copper crucifix which he had hung up on a nail opposite his bed.
sentences.sContent_eng: While he still went out, he had purchased of a coppersmith, for a few sous, a little copper crucifix which he had hung up on a nail opposite his bed.
sentences.sCn: 当他还能上街时，他从锅匠那儿用几个苏买到一个小的铜十字架，挂在床前钉子上。

trans.tranOther: a person who works copper or copper alloys
